Hi Ben,

Thanks for sending this through.

It looks like this email is generated through campaignflow. It seems that support@ is included on the email recipient list when a proposal from syd is accepted.

Campaignflow may be able adjust the recipient list and
  • Remove support@ to Novaricollective (254 - SYD accepted proposals)
  • Add support@ to Novaricollective Melbourne (306 - MEL accepted proposals)

Hi, received another nsw acceptance. This should be sent to nsw. Hopefully they have received it.

Support

Unit 74-76 Industrial Drive, Braeside VIC 3195

novaricollective.com.au

Hi Ben

Thanks for your patience, apologies didn't get back sooner however was a public holiday here in Sydney yesterday.

Our IT team have come back -

Novari use a custom integration they developed themselves internally so they'll need to follow this up with their own developers. If they are still using the same developers, this is likely Wolf IQ and Heath Maguire (heath@wolfiq.com.au) was their contact.

Kind regards,
